website_summaries.verdict: With the same core specs as the excellent Huawei Mate 10 Pro, the View 10 is a great way of snagging a powerhouse phone without emptying your bank account.
pros: The Honor View 10 has the power and performance of a top-end phone, but with a much more accessible price tag
cons: There's no waterproofing and the front-facing camera takes mediocre selfies

customer_reviews.title: Received the Chinese version
customer_reviews.text: The device I received was the Chinese version (BKL-AL20). NO US CARRIER WILL WORK with this device. Also, the device is NOT unlocked. Huawei has stopped providing unlock codes, so the device can NEVER BE UNLOCKED. Looking at previous reviews and questions, I assume previous buyers got the US version. The US version is referred to as the "View 10". The Chinese version is "V10", seen in screenshots below. "About phone" in the EMUI settings says Model BKL-L09, which is incorrect. This device supports the following LTE bands which are consistent with other Chinese devices, but useless in the US: B1/B3/B5/B8/B38/B39/B40/B41
customer_reviews.author: Eric R Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone at the 500$ price point
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone at the 500$ price point. Very similar in specs and performance like it's pricier cousin in the Huawei Mate 10 Pro, other than the latter's water resistant features. But unless you are planning to dunk the phone into your swimning pool, the phone works fine. All the responses are quick and you do get the feeling of having a high end processor running your device. The user interface is a modified version of Android Oreo and its decent. However, one can always use Nova Launcher to tailor it as per the needs of the user. Camera quality is good as well and can give the flagship phones a good competition. Overall, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Shreya Ghosh

customer_reviews.title: Locked bootloader
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone as it has good performance and was unlockable, this is useful to me as a developer, but now huawei support will no longer allow users to unlock their phones, despite this being an "unlocked" device. This makes this device worthless to me and I will be returning it and recending any recommendations i made for this brand unless I am provided with an unlock key as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Buckingham

customer_reviews.title: solid phone for the money
customer_reviews.text: this phone replaced my galaxy s7 which i had for a solid 2 years. the screen is big it's very quick and efficient. people might complain about the EMUI but i think it's a very refreshing version of android especially comparing it to samsung bloated cell phones. the battery life is also great and lasts a long time even with screen on.
customer_reviews.author: Arnberg Industries

customer_reviews.title: $350 steal
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny at $350-$400....has notification light, has NFC, battery life good, fast charging, screen good, processor is fast, fingerprint reader is fast, face unlock is fast, and 6 gig RAM/128 GB storage. Use Nova launcher and runs great. Cameras seem to be good, I don't take many photos. Bluetooth to vehicle no issues. Works on AT&T with no problems. Buy it. update 10/23/2019 Phone still works great. Have had no issues. Works with Android Auto in my Ford, battery great, Android 9, finger print sensor flawless, bluetooth ear buds, no complaints...all good.
customer_reviews.author: LiveLife

customer_reviews.title: Everything almost good.
customer_reviews.text: The phone is perfect except for the fact that inside is loose whenever is shake it eveything inside moves thats scary. I'll keep it i dont think it will affect anything for now... but that means that it wasnt done correctly however ill keep it cant afford to stay a month without a phone and i've been saving for several weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Luiskar Camargo

customer_reviews.title: ignorance: they still sell the phone without fixing much complained Google map issue
customer_reviews.text: the google did not work in this phone. i liked the phone very much and wanted keep the phone, but later I decided to return it due to that, the phone was released 11 months ago and a lot people already complained about the google map issue and they still sell a phone without fixing the issue! i take this as a serious ignorance from the manufacturer and highly doubt about their aftersale care for the customer.
customer_reviews.author: msidd021

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for a great price
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of research, I decided this was the best buy for what you get, adding black Fridays price of $349. and we bought 2. Update, now using both phones on a vacation in Europe, working great, we're using Yandex maps and taxi/Uber apps over here, and they work great 😁 Another update, phone is still going great, to those with Google map problem, found a simple fix, it works at 720, so just lower res. from 1080 to 720, and Google maps works great! Another update, we just got the Android 9 update in the 3rd week of Feb.! Works GREAT!-)))
customer_reviews.author: B Bear

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone But.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this phone. Storage amount (Favorite thing). Fast service. right Size. Light Weight. loud Speaker. Only things I am not a huge fan of. Picture quality is not as great as the MP state compared to my old Galaxy Note 4. The pictures like self-edit and I am not the biggest fan of that. I can also never find a good screen protector which is the most annoying thing EVER. For the Cost it is a great phone if you dont want to pay out right for a larger brand name.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Brunner

customer_reviews.title: great feel to it
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly fast phone, great feel to it, excellent bright display. I like it better than the Mate 10 Pro because of the following: Later version of 8.1, facial recognition, 3.5mm headset jack, plus expandable storage. You can't go wrong with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Ciggia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for this price range
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for this price range. It has everything I'm looking for: a large screen, facial recognition, support us carrier 4G network(finally), and a 6G memory. Fast shipping from Amazon, arrived within a day.
customer_reviews.author: Huayi Jiang

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the price, takes nicer quality pictures than top of the line iphone
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I purchased this phone. Bought it in the USA to use on AT&T's network. Had to go into the store, but they were able to provide me with a nano sim card that fits with no issues whatsoever! The call quality is a tiny bit muffled, but everything is still comprehensible, might be a setting I can tweak to adjust. All in all I'm impressed. I'm a hermit and hate calling people anyway, I bought this phone specifically to take nice quality pictures of my kid and to scroll through Facebook while people are talking to me, and this does a fantastic job. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. D. R.

customer_reviews.title: Insane battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this phone. Battery last better than any device I've ever used. Using accubattery app to prevent me from charging past 80% & therefore wearing out the battery slower. I only charge the phone occasionally in my vehicle. Don't have to charge it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Cu Bo

customer_reviews.title: A must buy phone
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing phone if you are in the US and are debating buying a non name brand phone that is a little shady ignore it because this phone is better then any other iPhone or Samsung and is so much cheaper. Not going to lie it has a few cosmetic flaws like the interface which is love or hate but all that stuff is easy to fix. Buy this phone you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Wifi issues initially, resolved with reboot
customer_reviews.text: Connecting to wifi was an issue for me, which seems to be common. While it appeared to be connected, things wouldn't work unless I turned wifi off. A little research and a reboot of both the router and the phone resolved that issue. I had the honor 6x for a year and a half and decided to upgrade as I needed more storage, and my mom needed to replace her cracked screen. I'm pleased with the value and the quality, but took one star off due to the headaches regarding wifi. Day 2.
customer_reviews.author: RobinT

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced junk becuse the screen is terrible
customer_reviews.text: The lcd screen has parallel side sloping lines that you can see when it's a full white or black screen, the colors on this thing are "crushed" it's really expensive for what you get, the only redeeming thing is that it has a micro sd slot and a 3.5mm jack. If you don't care for those two things then just buy the Huawei mate 10 pro, the cpu is out of site and it's a beast, the only downside to the mate 10 pro is it has not external micro sd slot or 3.5mm jack.
customer_reviews.author: haha

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone.
customer_reviews.text: This phone is awesome. I'm still using it now and works with cricket as this one is suppose to work with cricket. Takes amazing pictures and the zoom in as great. Sound quality and battery life Def 5 star. Still learning the features. Added a lot of customizations. Update June 15 2019, the phone would make a sound and have something on the lock screen reading "use microphone or camera to unlock" something within the lines. I only have fingerprint and pattern lock and only says that when I'm taking it out of my pocket. Still great tho.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Phone
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these to replace mine and my wife's aging phones. Compared to those to old things, these are beyond any level of greatness I have seen. What impressed me though is I also have a Samsung Galaxy 7 provided by my job. This was a new in box phone just a few months ago. The Honor View 10 is miles ahead of the Samsung. It is very responsive. Picture quality is great if you have a steady hand. Sound quality is pretty good, nice and clear but not like my old phone that had BL speakers. All things said and done, this has to be the best phone for the money you can get.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Shirah Jr.

customer_reviews.title: A long battery life, great octacore CPU and lots of memory
customer_reviews.text: Once you learn how to really use Huawei's EMUI OS, you can make last the battery life a long time without recharging, in my case, I can leave it without recharging up to 3 days, and of course, I use the phone and not only for phone calls, but also browsing the web and listening to the internet radio. And if I watch movies, a little "super charging" with the included charger and in minutes, I am back to 100% charged.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto

customer_reviews.title: DON'T GET THIS PHONE!
customer_reviews.text: Had this phone for sixth months when it broke. Can't get it fixed by Huawei or by anyone else because the phone is banned in America. Collosal waste of my money, and you are much better off buying from a better brand that isn't banned.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Graf

customer_reviews.title: Flagship performance for a cheaper price!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Arrived on time. Performance is snappy(even on games such as NBA 2k18). Can get two days of battery life as long as you don't play any games. Quick charging, Fingerprint reader can be used for navigation. Dual-sim or expandable storage. Volume during calls is loud enough to hurt your ears at max(coming from a guy in his 20s who works as a mechanic). Cons: Lots of pre-installed apps, some of which cannot be uninstalled. Smartphone speaker audio quality is average(can be fixed with good headset).
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: far exceeded my expectations. comes with a nice clear jelly case. works perfectly with my lte network in Trinidad and Tobago. There was a tax on the purchase that i never experienced before so i ended up paying like $530.00 in total so look out for that. No regrets though, camera is awesome and battery life is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Emile Raghunanan

customer_reviews.title: Fast phone
customer_reviews.text: Really fast cell phone, great in most everything. Just a few cons; can't send little video's via messaging, it downsizes way too much, down to 250k or so, the vid comes in total fuzzy to recipient, no way to adjust it either and no data on that on the internet (disappointing). I have to press or push on screen multiple times occasionally on the icon using pointing finger as we all should! Seems like it's designed for somebody's THUMB to press the screen, not the smaller, concise, index finger. I was taught many years ago; don't use your THUMBS to operate any electronic keyboard!!
customer_reviews.author: Stevie T.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. I think Huawei has an amazing line, the only problem with their phones is that they don't work with all the companies. The Honor View 10 has a great camera quality, good battery life and it's not expensive like other phones that are not this good. I totally recommend this phone to someone that use one of the telephone companies that works with this.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is amazing. I really like the size, speed and screen. It is a beautiful phone and the box is including the case protector and the screen film protector. I miss the fingerprint on the back cover of the phone. I have been using Huawei for last 5 years and I'll never come back to iPhone or Samsung. Definitely Huawei is highest quality by the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating experience
customer_reviews.text: freezes 100 times a day. Google maps stops working everytime there is a service update.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returning this phone.
customer_reviews.text: Have issues from day one. Called tech for help. But didn't resolve issues. Some Android apps will not function properly or at all. 1. MapMyRun does not track run accurately on its in-app map, 2. Google Maps was very sluggish for several days, 3. I can't share urls, images or copy into Google Keep Notes. 4. Built in timer only allows one timer. Versus Motorola can have multiple. 5. Don't think it has image stabilization ( a Very basic function) based on independent reviews. Plan to return this Honor View 10.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful hardware, but very poor android interface
customer_reviews.text: We love Honor View 10 hardware specifications (6 GB RAM, 128 GB internal memory, and top microprocessor etc.) but it's Android interface is the WORST that we have seen based on our Samsung S4 and 5 experience. The lack of "back" button, and very convoluted and confusion Android interface (e.g., irrational arrangement of photos in the gallery) is the major deficiency of this otherwise excellent cell phone. If the Honor View 10 Android interface would match Samsung S4-9, it would earn a solid 5 stars from me. Also wish there would be a phone support in addition to chat support.
customer_reviews.author: For what it is worth....

customer_reviews.title: A great phone at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I was lucky to catch this when on sale for $349. I love the camera for regular pictures and portraits but not my fav for low light. This phone is way above the competition at this price point. So far - no complaints other than limited options for cases.
customer_reviews.author: Settleddown

customer_reviews.title: If it breaks your on your own
customer_reviews.text: My screen broke less than a month after buying it and the seller or Amazon tried to help I had to pay out of pocket to get it fixed which sucks cause the phone otherwise was great just would never buy from this seller again
customer_reviews.author: jameil cruckshank

customer_reviews.title: Beast
customer_reviews.text: One can't ask for a better phone than Honor View 10. It's been a week and I haven't regretted buying this phone. This phone can easily compete with all premium range phones. Look and Feel: Can't get more classy Competibility: I tried running AT&T, T-Mobile And it works fine with these carriers. Camera: Comes with a lot of options to change the mode as needed. Battery life: With a decent usage, it can last at least a day. The only thing I wish would could have a better is the wifi connectivity. It keeps on turning ON and OFF by mistake. Overall an amazing phone
customer_reviews.author: Shrenik Ramani

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY GREAT VALUE
customer_reviews.text: After a few months of owning this phone, I can assure you that this is a great value and is well worth your money Pros -outstanding camera quality -very good battery life 50-60% on a full day with medium/heavy use -fast charging is great -great speed and toutch response -apps load quickly and storage space is plentiful -10:9 aspect ratio screen -usb C -fast fingerprint sensor and face sensor CONS -fast charger is specific to honor/huawei phones -screen power saver feature shuts off screen even after extending screen on time
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Can't use Google map
customer_reviews.text: The Google map app crash or freeze everytime I open it. Read reviews and alot having the same problem, but I just couldn't solve the issue following the online instructions
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good phone  buy it don't listen to the bad press
customer_reviews.text: The best part about the phone is the simple fact that it's unlocked no restrictions like a (iPhone or gallaxy)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best phone for me
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find a thing I didn't like. I have been using it for 1 yr now and still very happy. I am not a gamer but I use it constantly for everything, shopping, Google maps, Waze and GPS, shopping again.... Charges in about 90 minutes completely, works perfectly with my 🇺🇸 TMobile card and 🇮🇹 TIM card simultaneously, in US and in Europe. What else?
customer_reviews.author: Lumaross

customer_reviews.title: Camera function problem
customer_reviews.text: Everything works fine except taking pictures. Sometimes I clicked the camera button to take pictures, the weird thing happened, - the phone just jumped out camera function, and changed to the main menu
customer_reviews.author: appleapple

customer_reviews.title: there is no US warranty provided by Huawei
customer_reviews.text: The item is listed as having U.S. warranty. After buying it, the finger print sensor stopped working after about 10 months. When I contacted Huawei U.S.A., I was told that Honor view 10 is not officially provided in the U.S. and thus they don't provide warranty for it.
customer_reviews.author: Z. W

customer_reviews.title: Great phone at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Has everything I was looking for in a phone for a lot less than other brands. Have been using Honor phones for 2 years and plan on sticking with them.
customer_reviews.author: James L McClain

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY AND YOUR TIME
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money, And the worst customer service has never seen. Trash. Never never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT! You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: Far exceeded expectations! That Ai chip seems to keep my battery at 9-10 hrs of screen on time even after loading it up with apps. Amazing high end device for anyone looking for a flagship device. Only issue I had was that it needs to be in a case because of it's incredibly slippery metal body and 6in display. But that comes with the territory!
customer_reviews.author: boycrazyboy

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This phone is not without its glitches but works as expected. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: reaper3383

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I turn it on as soon as I get it out of the box and this comes out, can't hard reset, can't turn it off, just keeps rebooting to that white screen over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Arellano

customer_reviews.title: Cheap than Samsung,  but has good specs, and good design.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for my wife. And she was excited this phone. She likes photo camera. 🤳 is great. Beautiful design. Very fast and keep charge whole day.
customer_reviews.author: Matvei Iliunov

customer_reviews.title: Very good phone
customer_reviews.text: After 15 months of hard using it works like new. Battery is very good. Love it. Got second for my wife 2 months ago
customer_reviews.author: kodak

customer_reviews.title: Flagship phone for 30% of the price
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, features and performance of a flagship phone for a very affordable price. Face recognition works very well, but one uses the fingerprint unlock feature much more often. In the end it is more practical. Battery life is at least 2 days, even at heavy usage. Dual Sim card works perfectly. Only 1 Sim card works at 4G speed. Lots of storage space. Perfect phone.
customer_reviews.author: hepc6c5

customer_reviews.title: Worth for money
customer_reviews.text: This is my fav brand....I bought it 5 month before...now started to recommend my family & friends.. Enjoying..all features... Camera pixel high both front and back compared to iPhones,superb fast recharge...
customer_reviews.author: Bavanya

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: great phone with out the price so far all my apps works great
customer_reviews.author: latino

customer_reviews.title: Content with my switch from Samsung
customer_reviews.text: I am always a little worried trying a new brand. I switched from Samsung and so far I am glad I did. Fast, good looking phone for less money than Samsung. Satesfied with the screen and camera. The phone works well with Family Mobile. I just had to adjust the APN settings a little bit to be able to send MMS.
customer_reviews.author: Chinook

customer_reviews.title: Hidden GEM!!!! super phone, has manual focus, take excellent photoes, a lot of advanced features
customer_reviews.text: equivalent to top popular phones with only a fraction of the cost, huawei honor phone is a hidden GEM, take advantage of it before everyone recognize it , which would of cause drive up the cost i was a all timer iphone user, recently discovered Huawei / Honor phone...

customer_reviews.title: screen problem
customer_reviews.text: the screen keeps freezing. I don't recommend to buy this phone at all.

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Terrible phone. Would return if I could, seriously disappointed. DO NOT BUY.

customer_reviews.title: Prefect Phone
customer_reviews.text: My previous phone is samsung S9.It's battery life sucks.Honor V10 experience very smooth just like s9,But It can last one day and haft.wonderful,I love this phone.
customer_reviews.author: chen jinsong

customer_reviews.title: perfect phone
customer_reviews.text: this is an amazing phone, the battery lasts for so long and there is a phone manager app that helps with keeping your battery percentage up. it is very fast, and has amazing definition on its camera.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Downey

customer_reviews.title: Decent phone
customer_reviews.text: Decent phone overall. Cameras are just okay, can't compare to the high-end Android phones but that's fine given the price.
customer_reviews.author: IS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this phone. Good battery life, great camera. I am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline L. Ream

customer_reviews.title: This phone does not come with a earphone
customer_reviews.text: This is a good phone for the price I paid($358). I wish this phone would have come with an earphone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, top tier phone
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of Huawei/Honor products. We use two Huawei Mate 10 pros, a couple of Honor 7Xs and an Honor 8. I am expecting these products to be the next victim of the tariff wars, so I bought this as a back up phone. Used it to compare it. I think it is the best dollar for dollar full feature phone I have used. To be clear, it is a Chevy to the Mate 10 Pro Cadillac. It is a more basic case presentation and does not have the Leica camera treatment. That being said it is practically operationally the same as the Mate 10 for a lot less money.
customer_reviews.author: gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great phone horrible battery
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone, but the battery is awful. I didn't think it was that great when I first bought it. I thought that it's just the way it is. Just 4 months later and the battery is at 30% charge after 15- to 20 minutes of use. Just not happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: jlut

customer_reviews.title: It lasts forever. Use it with Straight Talk.
customer_reviews.text: Love the Honor phones. This is my second one. Also have the Honor 5. Had it for 2 years. Still works great. Giving it to my one grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Freitag

customer_reviews.title: Phone is Great!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the seller, the phone was clearly not new, although they did take the time to print a sticker that said "NEW" and stick in on the box. I would strongly recommend this phone to anyone looking for a great phone with amazing battery life.
customer_reviews.author: David L

customer_reviews.title: Very good !
customer_reviews.text: Very very very good battery, good picture quality not as good for the video, the design is really nice
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: The phone works very well
customer_reviews.text: Just everyday cell phone use for the price it compares to any other expensive phones
customer_reviews.author: VICTORLAMADRID

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was able to buy 2 of these during the Black Friday sale, extremely happy with my purchase. Overall a great phone and haven't ran into any issues yet.
customer_reviews.author: AdrGSXR

customer_reviews.title: Its a very good and powerful phone
customer_reviews.text: Its a bit of a pain in the arse to get the gsm service activated and what not but good lord this is a good phone. It's fast, easy to use and it looks good. It's worth the 415 price point. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Powerful with lots of internal storage. Extra card slot for additional storage
customer_reviews.author: Punisher 10

customer_reviews.title: I'ts a good smart phone and does what I need it to do
customer_reviews.text: It takes really good quality pictures, has a good fingerprint reader, and can play most modern mobile games without much of an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Fields

customer_reviews.title: Battery life, features rich, plenty of memory
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone, exceptional value. I have changed 3 phones, before i fell in love with this phone.. The same happened with the 3rd wife :-)
customer_reviews.author: LEONID ORLOV

customer_reviews.title: Amazing smart phone!
customer_reviews.text: Been super satisfied with this phone's performance as well as camera and functioning. Really great buy at amazing price, worth it over and over again. Highly recommended

customer_reviews.title: Telphone blocked
customer_reviews.text: After the second day using, the telephone restart alone and no reconnaissance my password. Could you help me with that? Regards, Luciano.

customer_reviews.title: The unit works well
customer_reviews.text: I really liked IR blaster function, so eith other programs also are working well.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and quick
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! Was scared that I was getting scammed, but I was wrong and thank God for that!

customer_reviews.title: Great performance at an awesome price
customer_reviews.text: This fit my needs perfectly and I haven't even used all of the enhanced features of this phone.

customer_reviews.title: A value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice 📷. Vibrant picture quality. Long battery life. Excellent processing speed. Very well Impressed !!
customer_reviews.author: Nish

customer_reviews.title: purchase for use in China only
customer_reviews.text: The seller stated the phone would work in the USA. It does work but it is programmed for China and all in Chinese. Very difficult!

customer_reviews.title: Strongly recommend this phone
customer_reviews.text: Best second phone or uses for uber and lyft driver, it’s smooth like iphone x and faster than samsung note 8 or s8 seems like iphone
customer_reviews.author: Tu Truong

customer_reviews.title: System runs quickly
customer_reviews.text: The phone works well, the system runs quickly and saves energy, and taking pictures is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great features for the price.
customer_reviews.text: After owning the Honor 6 I was looking forward to the next level. Not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Fishburne

customer_reviews.title: Kirin 970 4k Camera
customer_reviews.text: A God#@$!?# iphone 8 plus for $350 on black Friday!!! 4k video high res pictures. Home button with fingerprint and back recent built in. Camera with bokah and portrait modes. Fast charge. Beautiful phone pictures do not do justice.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Caffarelli

customer_reviews.title: Wifi and Bluetooth stopped working 2 months after unboxing
customer_reviews.text: I like the battery life.i don't like that after 2 months my wifi and Bluetooth stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. Been using for almost a year now and no issue. Excellent picture quality.

customer_reviews.title: Screen
customer_reviews.text: Everything working good, the screen is beutiful the camera make a nice pictures !
customer_reviews.author: Tibor David

customer_reviews.title: Overall I think it's a great phone in a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Super advance technology with so many features, love this phone over iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Nick USA

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice hand set cover all kinds of up to day use of smart phone. I like it
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Good phone but cheap display.
customer_reviews.text: So coming from Samsung displays, this display is horrible. Also being an Honor flagship device it could do better. Gaming wise phone is fast all around.
customer_reviews.author: Ritza A.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of storage
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone with lots of storage and a good deal on Amazon Prime Day. Only issue is that it isn't waterproof, but for the price you can't beat it. Wish it came in gold or silver too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice phone. The speed is very fast
customer_reviews.text: Very nice phone. The speed is very fast, memory is top-level config with 6GB. I love this phone very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good call quality good screen the only thing missing is ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this phone today and I am impressed Apple Samsung and pixle 2 you can't touch this phone and the price is right and I try them all . Really good call quality good screen the only thing missing is front facing speakers
customer_reviews.author: mariusz kowalski

customer_reviews.title: Great phone but MMS IS NOT WORKING
customer_reviews.text: Great phone but MMS IS NOT WORKING , obviously it is not compatible with some phone service providers.. That is ridiculous for 500$ phone!
customer_reviews.author: Liudmyla Kurbakova

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The phone works awesome, package arrived perfect. Love it! :)
customer_reviews.author: Mario Ramazzini

customer_reviews.title: Works like it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Came with less than 50% battery but everything seems to be working so far. Nothing rly wrong w it. The face recognition set up process isn't rly the best tho. I thought the fingerprint scanner was a home button too, but it's just a scanner
customer_reviews.author: Xie

customer_reviews.title: this phone is so very nice, just could not get used to such a ...
customer_reviews.text: this phone is so very nice, just could not get used to such a large screen so i returned it.
customer_reviews.author: ca8050

customer_reviews.title: Great value, runs games like PUBG amazingly
customer_reviews.text: Phone is everything I expected it to be. Great value, runs games like PUBG amazingly well
customer_reviews.author: Benji

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT HAVE A WARRANTY AND DOES NOT HAVE FAST CHARGING
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent enough phone and it's specs on paper are nice. It does not however have fast charging. And it burns through battery very quickly. My LG K20 plus that I got for free from Metro PCS charges 2 hours faster than this phone. Plus the warranty wasn't included and it was supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: Tombstone327

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic phone, but also take caution and buy a screen protector/tempered glass.
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly fast, and the phone operates perfectly for my needs. I think it's a great entry level into flagship phones without purchasing a Samsung or iPhone. It fits well in the hand, and the quality of the screen is great. It plays emulators, games, multi-windowed apps, etc. flawlessly without hiccup. Only thing I'd say I dislike about this phone directly is the UI and how user friendly it really tries to avoid being. It can be changed, obviously, so that doesn't take away from the quality of phone that it is. Would also highly recommend buying tempered glass for this as your screen will scratch and get nicks in it very easily without it.
customer_reviews.author: Code

customer_reviews.title: Really like this phone
customer_reviews.text: Really like this phone. I switched to it from an LG V20. It's a beast. Not a fan of the emui but that was easily solved with a launcher. Lots of customization options. Love the facial recognition unlock feature. Super thin. Zippy, haven't noticed any lag. Honor provided a clear tpu case and a screen protector installed(not tempered glass). The only issue is the lack of OIS in the camera, but if you have steady hands this is a non issue. DH liked it so much he's ordering himself one.
customer_reviews.author: smidget

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I've had so far
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the best phones I've purchased. I like buying phones on a budget so this was a nice purchase. It feels like a premium phone. I think I'd rather have this one than an iPhone. It's not that expensive, the camera is great, I don't mind the lack of image stabilization. So much storage it's crazy, the super charger is so useful and this phone continues to get updates so that's great. I bought a Samsung note 5 before on Amazon and I got screwed basically. The phone wasn't new and the charger was not original but with this phone, everything came legit. Brand new. Thank you for being honest and sending the right stuff
customer_reviews.author: Barbs

customer_reviews.title: Nice little midrange phone
customer_reviews.text: Takes good photos, great battery life, fast performance. It's not as nice as my Mate 10, but it' 90% of that phone easily. I bought this to replace the GF's Samsung Note5, which her battery life was so poor now that she couldn't do anything with it past about 4 hours. I'm convinced that Samsung introduced an intentional bug in Google Play services to run the battery life in the ground. Planned obsolescence and all that. Anyway, this is a great little phone for the enthusiast that doesn't want to spend the money on the Mate 10 or the p20 pro.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Can't get repair or replacement parts from here.
customer_reviews.text: High quality camera-GREAT! Sim card holder broke and could be put back in carefully, but various glitches began at that point. I cannot find where to get a replacement SIM holder to see if that's the only issue with this phone. I have replaced it with something else for much less money, but the camera is not as good and I can't find the pictures once I take them in the new phone....In general, I have had nothing but bad luck with cell phones since we went away from the Yellow ALLTEL walkie-talkie/cells..... Lack of service availability from the seller and I don't know how to contact the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: MARTHA

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the price. Actually unbeatable. Comparable to my Galaxy S9+ in speed and features. Even has couple cool features not found on the S9+. Eg, super FAST charging function. Only thing I've noticed that is not good is the camera. The pic definition leaves quite a bit to be desired. If you are not a selfie fiend and didn't care about brand coolness. Get this phone.
customer_reviews.author: behbeh

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Took The Gamble
customer_reviews.text: I have been really impressed with this phone. Truly missed having a device that didn't constantly require recharging. Can get through two days of typical use before requiring recharge. Great quality on just about every aspect. Nice bells and whistles too. Only cons: *No image stabilization. *No wireless charging. *Not as water resistant as most newer phones. Even in light of those facts, would not hesitate to buy this phone again. Later Samsung and Apple!
customer_reviews.author: Phill Pack

product_meta.title: Honor View10 GSM Unlocked Smartphone, AI Processor, 5.99” FullView Display, 20MP + 16MP Dual-Lens AI Camera, Dual SIM 4G, Fast Charging, 6/128 GB, Black (US Warranty)
product_meta.description: Color:BlackHonor View10 unlocked phone, 5.99" full-view display, 6GB/128GB, AI processor, 16MP + 20MP dual-lens camera, unlocked smartphone, Black (us warranty). Connectivity: 802.11 b/g/n, 2.4G, USB 2.0, Bluetooth4.2.
feature_bullets: The Honor View10 Full View Display is a stunning new bezel-less 5.99-inch screen with an 18:9 display ratio.
With 2X the speed of 4G LTE, Honor V10 gives you the ultimate gigabit LTE experience capable of speeds up to 1 gigabit per second. It offers Dual SIM & Dual LTE capabilities.
With a large 3750 mAh battery coupled with smart ai power management that learns from user behavior optimizing maximum battery life. A full day of power even for gamers!
The Honor View10's new intelligent Dual Camera incorporates AI powered real-time scene and object recognition delivering exceptional image quality with minimal effort.
The Honor View10 is built on the latest Android 8.1 (Oreo) with EMUI 8.0

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars309 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Phone, power/wall charger, case, USB-C cable and sim ejection tool.
